Title: Handbook of the Loess Ruins Expedition
Text:
CSC Field Notes on the Overthrow of the AL104 Catastrophe-VII
The simple settlements that were once constructed with military installations were completely depopulated at the time of the Catastrophe.
Today, the environment is still harsh, with frequent fog and some anomalies in the Wuthering Waves subindex.
It seems to be frequently raided by Exiles operating in the vicinity, leaving little in this area.
